abstract: If, as a culture, we haven't graduated beyond rather sophomoric objectification, then let it be said that we have at least learned to objectify on the basis of equal opportunity.
snippet: If, as a culture, we haven't graduated beyond rather sophomoric objectification, then let it be said that we have at least learned to objectify on the basis of equal opportunity.
lead_paragraph: No one ever said the revolution would be sexy. In fact, media coverage of Occupy Wall Street suggested quite the opposite, tending to emphasize the unkempt woolliness and generally unsanitary nature of the movement.

headline.main: The Underappreciated Hunks of Occupy Wall Street
